title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: This issue is specific to the motif platform. On motif, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, which make them appear as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, further highlighting them and making them stand out more.
